title: Starless: 21st Century Nymphomaniacs
synopsis: Sawatari Yukito was looking for a summer part time job, when by chance he came across an advertisement in a job search magazine for a position with really nice wages. Upon quickly contacting the employer and learning that the position had yet to be filled, he applied without delay. The job was as a live-in servant at a mansion.
characters: ['Mamiya, Marie', 'Mitarai, Yuuna', 'Mamiya, Marika', 'Mamiya, Marisa', 'Nonohara, Mikako', 'Asagiri, Sachie']
staff: [['Tominaga, Tsuneo', ['Episode Director']], ['Sei Shoujo', ['Original Character Design', ' Original Creator']], ['Shinkai, Kouki', ['Editing']], ['Kano, Akira', ['Character Design']]]
